FakerMod:MeleeStance.NAME: Melee Stance
DESCRIPTION: Your #yMelee Attacks gain damage boost equal to #b10% of your missing HP. NL NL Current damage boost: #b

FakerMod:RangedStance.NAME: Ranged Stance
DESCRIPTION: Your #yRanged Attacks cost NL #r2 HP per [E] instead. NL Upon exiting this #yStance, NL draw #b2.
